attributes.action: Limit climate change before it is too late...cut emissions to zero by 2025!
attributes.additional_details: Many countries have committed to zero emissions such as Canada, Columbia, China, Costa Rica, Denmark, Ethiopia, Finland, France Germany. Why the old up? The longer it is ignored, the more damage is done. If committed, we stand a chance at saving the planet before the changes become irreversible!
attributes.background: Climate change is ruining the planet by destroying the habitats of many species of animal (wild fires, polluted waters, melting polar ice, etc). This is a global crisis which can cause the extinction of many species of animal and the suffering of future generations of people by extreme weather.
